3 import json
4 import rospy
5 import actionlib
6 from flipbot2_base.msg import BotGoalAction
7 from flipbot2_base.msg import BotGoalFeedback
8 from flipbot2_base.msg import BotGoalResult
9 from flipbot2_base.msg import BotGoalGoal
10 from rospy.timer import sleep
11 from std_msgs.msg import Int64
12 from std_msgs.msg import String
13 import sys
14 right_one_index = {1, 2, 3}
15 left_two_index = {7, 8, 9}
16 
17 
18 class actionclient:
19 
20  def __init__(self,bot_no):
21  self.client = actionlib.SimpleActionClient("bot1", BotGoalAction)
22  self.pub_servo = rospy.Publisher('servo', String, queue_size=10)
23  self.pub_colorReq= rospy.Publisher('colorReq', String, queue_size=10)
24  rospy.Subscriber("dest", Int64, self.callback)
25  self.client.wait_for_server()
26  self.callbackCalled = False
27  self.feedback = BotGoalFeedback()
28  def callback(self,data:Int64):
29  self.callbackCalled = True
30  rospy.loginfo("Sending Goal")
31  self.goal = BotGoalGoal(index=int(data.data))
32  self.client.send_goal(self.goal)
33  self.client.wait_for_result()
34  self.result= self.client.get_result()
35  rospy.loginfo("got result")
36  sleep(0.5)
37  self.servopush = self.servodir()
38  rospy.loginfo("Actuating servo in %i",self.servopush)
39  self.pub_servo.publish(str(self.servopush))
40  sleep(0.5)
41  self.client.send_goal(BotGoalGoal(index=-1 * int(data.data)))
42  self.client.wait_for_result()
43  self.callbackCalled = False
44  def clientRoutine(self):
45  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
46  while not self.callbackCalled:
47  rospy.loginfo("waiting for color data")
48  self.pub_colorReq.publish("1")
49  rospy.sleep(3)
50  def servodir(self):
51  if(self.result.inductIndex == 1):
52  if self.result.destIndex in right_one_index:
53  return 1
54  else:
55  return -1
56  if(self.result.inductIndex == 2):
57  if self.result.destIndex in left_two_index:
58  return 1
59  else:
60  return -1
61 
62 if __name__ == "__main__":
63  rospy.init_node('client'+str(sys.argv[1]))
64  rospy.loginfo("Init client node "+ sys.argv[1])
65  ac = actionclient(int(sys.argv[1]))
66  ac.clientRoutine()
67  rospy.spin()
